Where can I find more information about these false positive warnings from antivirus software?

You can find more information about the false positive warnings from antivirus software by reviewing the resources provided, such as the Malwarebytes blog post on PUP.Optional.BitcoinMiner and the Kaspersky blog post on "not-a-virus" warnings.

These are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
